name: UsersController
description: Admin Bot API for user lifecycle management

deactivate.notes: Queues DeactivateUserWorker async job. User must be active.

reactivate.notes: User must be deactivated. Synchronous operation.

authentication_notes: Requires b3_api_key parameter matching ENV['B3_API_KEY']. Key must be >16 characters. No user context - operates with system privileges.
security_warning: No rate limiting. Sensitive admin operations.
